name: A Totally Normal Castle
description:
You've found yourself in a totally normal caste. Inanimate objects won't start coming to life right? Right?

This is my submission for the Flair Fair Game Jam which is also my first ever game jam! The theme was: "The Environment Is Alive." 

I hope you all enjoy the game and comments and criticism are welcomed!

Controls:

Pretty basic. A and D to move left and right, space to jump, click to swing your sword.

Credits:

Main Character Sprite and Animations by Sven Thole on the Unity Asset Store

(https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/characters/bandits-pixel-art-104130)

All other art was made by me (tiles, enemies, enemy hurt animation)

(also the armor stand is totally not a Minecraft armor stand (however I did draw it I was just using a reference))
